All Classes

  • All Classes Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Bill
    Bills are payment requests addressed to specific buyers.
    BillCreationException
    Exception thrown for a POST when the Bill cannot be created.
    BillDeliveryException
    Exception thrown for a POST when the Bill cannot be delivered.
    BillException
    Exception which is extended by other exceptions related with Bill.
    BillQueryException
    Exception thrown for a GET when the Bill cannot be retrieved.
    BillStatus
    The type Bill status.
    BillUpdateException
    Exception thrown for a PUT when the Bill cannot be updated.
    BitPayException
    General BitPay Exception which is inherited by all other exceptions.
    BitPayLogger
    The type Bit pay logger.
    Buyer
    Allows merchant to pass buyer related information in the invoice object.
    Buyer
    The type Buyer.
    Client
    The type Client.
    Config
    The type Config.
    Currencies
    The type Currencies.
    Currency
    The type Currency.
    CurrencyException
    Exception which is extended by other exceptions related with Currency.
    CurrencyQr
    The type Currency qr.
    CurrencyQueryException
    Exception thrown for a GET when the Currency cannot be retrieved.
    DateDeserializer
    The type Date deserializer.
    DateSerializer
    The type Date serializer.
    Env
    The type Environment.
    Env.Tokens
    The type Tokens.
    Facade
    Facades named collections of capabilities that can be granted, such as the ability to create invoices or grant refunds.
    Invoice
    The type Invoice.
    InvoiceBuyerProvidedInfo
    Information collected from the buyer during the process of paying an invoice.
    InvoiceCancellationException
    Exception thrown for a DELETE when the Invoice cannot be cancelled.
    InvoiceCreationException
    Exception thrown for a POST when the Invoice cannot be created.
    InvoiceData
    The type Invoice data.
    InvoiceException
    Exception which is extended by other exceptions related with Invoice.
    InvoiceItemizedDetails
    The type Invoice itemized details.
    InvoiceQueryException
    Exception thrown for a GET when the Invoice cannot be retrieved.
    InvoiceStatus
    The type Invoice status.
    InvoiceTransaction
    Initially empty when the invoice is created.
    InvoiceTransactionDetails
    The type Invoice transaction details.
    InvoiceUniversalCodes
    Object containing wallet-specific URLs for payment protocol.
    InvoiceUpdateException
    Exception thrown for a PUT when the Invoice cannot be updated.
    Item
    The type Item.
    KeyUtils
    The type Key utils.
    Ledger
    Ledgers are records of money movement.
    LedgerEntry
    The type Ledger entry.
    LedgerException
    Exception which is extended by other exceptions related with Ledger.
    LedgerQueryException
    Exception thrown for a GET when the Ledger cannot be retrieved.
    MinerFees
    The total amount of fees that the purchaser will pay to cover BitPay's UTXO sweep cost for an invoice.
    MinerFeesItem
    The type Miner fees item.
    Payout
    The type Payout.
    PayoutBatch
    The type Payout batch.

    Exception thrown for a POST when the Payout Batch Notification cannot be created.
    PayoutBatchQueryException
    Exception thrown for a POST when the Payout Batch cannot be retrieved.
    PayoutCancellationException
    Exception thrown for a DELETE when the Payout cannot be cancelled.
    PayoutCreationException
    Exception thrown for a POST when the Payout cannot be created.

    PayoutStatus
    The type Payout status.
    Policy
    The type Policy.
    Rate
    Rate is a class that represents a currency name, currency code, and value, and is used to create an object that is used when fetching exchange rates from the API.
    RateException
    Exception which is extended by other exceptions related with Rate.
    RateQueryException
    Exception thrown for a GET when the Rate cannot be retrieved.
    Rates
    Rates are exchange rates, representing the number of fiat currency units equivalent to one BTC.
    RecipientReferenceMethod
    The type Recipient reference method used in Payout Instruction.
    RecipientStatus
    The type Recipient status.
    Refund
    Fully paid invoices can be refunded via the merchant's authorization to issue a refund, while underpaid and overpaid invoices are automatically executed by BitPay to issue the underpayment or overpayment amount to the customer.
    RefundCancellationException
    Exception thrown for a DELETE when the Refund cannot be cancelled.
    RefundCreationException
    Exception thrown for a POST when the Refund cannot be created.
    RefundException
    Exception which is extended by other exceptions related with Refund.
    RefundInfo
    The type Refund info.
    RefundInfo
    The type Refund info.
    RefundQueryException
    Exception thrown for a GET when the Refund cannot be retrieved.
    RefundStatus
    The type Refund status.
    RefundUpdateException
    Exception thrown for a PUT when the Refund cannot be updated.
    RefundWebhook
    The type Refund webhook.
